bug.author: holdenk
bug.summary: GKE util with basic auth still requires client id
bug.description: This is related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/2687>#2687</denchmark-link> , but the shell scripts need updating too.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.85. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Do you mean kfctl.sh? The shell scripts are deprecated and no longer really supported for GCP. People should switch to using the go binary.
Interesting, maybe we should print out the deprecation warning? I'll try this with the go binary :)
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
